alert.note: Alert for Southern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 6:27PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Herkimer County through 700 PM EDT... At 627 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cedarville, or 10 miles south of Ilion, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ilion, Mohawk, West Winfield, Jordanville, Cedarville, Elizabethtown, Warren, Birmingham Corners, Jersalem Hill, Cullen, Spinnerville, Cedarville Station, Cedar Lake, Gulph, South Columbia, East Winfield, Parker Corners, Cranes Corners, South Ilion and Chepachet. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
